ev3steuerung

Interface MqttBrick

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EV3_Brick

    public interface MqttBrick
    Interface to make Mqtt-Functionality available

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void emergencyShutdown()
      Method to call from MqttHelper when "emergency shutdown" message arrives.
      java.lang.String getStateName() 
      void manualFix()
      Method to call from MqttHelper when "manual fix" message arrives.
      void messageArrived(java.lang.String message)
      Method to call when a message is recieved on the Topic vwp/DEVICE_ID.
      void startMqtt()
      Method to start MQTT-Handling by creating a new MqttHelper Class and setting mqttHelper
      void stopMqtt()
      Stops the Mqtt-Handler, closes all connections and deletes all folders

    • Method Detail

      • emergencyShutdown

        void emergencyShutdown()
        Method to call from MqttHelper when "emergency shutdown" message arrives. This sets the state forcibly to ShuttingDown
        See Also:
        ShuttingDown, MqttHelper

      • getStateName

        java.lang.String getStateName()

      • manualFix

        void manualFix()
        Method to call from MqttHelper when "manual fix" message arrives. This sets a fix flag, if the current State is instanceof Maint
        See Also:
        Maint, MqttHelper

      • messageArrived

        void messageArrived(java.lang.String message)
        Method to call when a message is recieved on the Topic vwp/DEVICE_ID. No Checks have been made to the input. Handles produce, confirm, sleep
        Parameters:
        message - Message that arrived over Mqtt from MES
        See Also:
        MqttHelper, Mqtt-Threads, Recipe

      • startMqtt

        void startMqtt()
        throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method to start MQTT-Handling by creating a new MqttHelper Class and setting mqttHelper
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - When there was a problem creating the mqtt-handler
        See Also:
        MqttHelper

      • stopMqtt

        void stopMqtt()
        Stops the Mqtt-Handler, closes all connections and deletes all folders
        See Also:
        Control, MqttHelper.close()
